message: Hi Bob, let's start with a 60/40 split. I believe it's a fair offer to kick things off.
Alice, I think a 60/40 split in my favor is more fair, considering I'll be making the proposal this round.  Let's get this done!
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 55/45 split.  Time is running out, and this offer is better than what inflation will leave us with.
